titles.title: Kyoukai no Rinne (2017)
Kyoukai no Rinne S3
境界のRINNE (2017)
Rin-ne: Season 3
경계의 린네 (2017)
境界的轮回 第三季

anime.description: Saving lost souls on the tightest budget known to man is only a day`s work for half-human, half-Shinigami kind-of-thing http://anidb.net/ch72753 [Rinne]! Together with the almost too-collected http://anidb.net/ch72755 [Sakura] and his black cat http://anidb.net/ch72752 [Rokumon], life continues as normal as Rinne helps guide the dead to their final rest. However, new transfers are never a good sign, and a popular http://anidb.net/ch87714 [fortune teller] ends up at Rinne and Sakura`s school as their new teacher. Things get chaotic when a strange http://anidb.net/ch87713 [girl] wielding a scythe makes an appearance, and Rinne realizes that he might discover a major piece surrounding the mystery of his past. Source: sentai filmworks

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: multi-segment episodes
tag.description: Multi-segment episodes are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes], which are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length (up to and including 10 minutes). Also not to be confused with an OVA or music video with multiple (otherwise unrelated) full-length http://anidb.net/t7241 [bundled episodes] consolidated into a single episode video track.

tag.name: Weekly Shounen Sunday
tag.description: Weekly Shounen Sunday is a weekly shounen manga magazine published in Japan by Shogakukan since 1959. Contrary to its title, Weekly Shounen Sunday issues are released on Wednesdays. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: ショッピングモールの姉
Ane at the Shopping Mall
Annette du centre commercial
Shopping Mall no Ane
episode.summary: Sakura meets a fortune teller who illegally possesses a Shinigami tool. Rinne goes to collect it, but the fortune teller won`t give up her crystal ball without a fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 輪廻の輪 一斉清掃 / 恨み無限大 / 雨の中の子犬
Wheel of Reincarnation Cleanup Day / Infinite Malice / A Puppy in the Rain
Le nettoyage de la roue de la réincarnation – Une rancœur sans limites – Un chiot sous la pluie
Rinne no Wa: Issei Seisou / Urami Mugendai / Ame no Naka no Koinu
episode.summary: Rinne and the other Shinigami are tasked with cleaning the Wheel of Reincarnation. The dangerous work only gets worse when a brawl breaks out, and Damashigami enter the scene. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 呪われたエース / 私を描いて
The Cursed Ace / Draw Me
Le champion maudit – Dessine-moi
Norowareta Ace / Watashi o Egaite
episode.summary: A ghost hand seems to have a grudge against a member of the track team. Later, Sakura discovers a mysterious female spirit who demands art students to draw her face. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゴールドライセンス
Gold License
Le permis or
Gold License
episode.summary: When Sabato gets caught distributing fake Shinigami Gold licenses, Rinne discovers that his father might have been a genius Shinigami in high school! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黒星三世 / 開運の壺 / 虹色のタケノコ
Kuroboshi Sansei / The Lucky Pot / Bamboo Shoot in Rainbow Color
Sanse Kuroboshi – Le pot de chance – La pousse de bambou arc-en-ciel
Kuroboshi Sansei / Kaiun no Tsubo / Niji-iro no Takenoko
episode.summary: Tamako asks Rinne to train a young black cat to support a Shinigami, but this cat`s particular phobia gets in the way. Later, Rinne hopes to intercept a "lucky" pot of money! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 1
Opening 1
特別保護霊鳥 / ジューンブライド / 地獄の金庫
Special Protected Sacred Bird / June Bride / The Safe from Hell
L`esprit-oiseau protégé – Mariée de juin – Le coffre des enfers
Tokubetsu Hogo Reichou / June Bride / Jigoku no Kinko
episode.summary: Shoma offers to pay Rinne handsomely to take care of a sacred bird, forgetting to mention the bird`s frightening appetite. Later, Sakura meets the ghost of an angry bride. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さまよえるパワーストーン / ポルターガイスト / 死神界のタブー
Wandering Power Stone / Poltergeist / The Taboo in the Shinigami World
La pierre de pouvoir errante – Poltergeist – Les tabous des Shinigami
Samayoeru Power Stone / Poltergeist / Shinigami Sakai no Taboo
episode.summary: Jumonji finally gets a chance to impress Sakura when he tries to quell a mischievous spirit. Later, Sakura and Rinne help a "creepy" spirit give the performance of his life. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 七日たったら開けること / 銀色のカマ / 死神王子
Open After Seven Days / Silver Scythe / Prince of the Shinigami
À ouvrir dans sept jours – La faux argentée – Le prince Shinigami
Nanoka Dattara Akeru Koto / Gin`iro no Kama / Shinigami Ouji
episode.summary: A cursed doll from Ageha`s past comes to haunt Renge. Later, Rinne helps a spirit by setting her up on a date with Matsugo, despite Matsugo`s lingering affections for Rinne! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第一回組合大会 / いまわしき予言
The First Union Meeting / An Ominous Prophecy
La première assemblée syndicale – L`abominable prédiction
Dai Ikkai Kumiai Taikai / Imarishiki Yogen
episode.summary: Someone is trying to take over the Damashigami Company! Later, when Renge tries to steal Annette`s Peep Ball, she sees a vision of Kain... putting handcuffs on her? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仏間で謝れ / 知恵の女神 / 宝の川
Apologize in the Altar Room / Goddess of Wisdom / River of Treasure
Excuse-toi à l`autel – La déesse de la sagesse – La rivière au trésor
Butsuma de Ayamare / Chie no Megami / Takara no Kawa
episode.summary: Sabato falls victim to the mackerel curse! Later, Jumonji invites Sakura to study for a test at his place, only to have his alone time with her horribly interrupted. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 別荘の悪霊 / ナスロマン / ワンコイン調査
Evil Spirit in the Summer House / Eggplant Romance / One Coin Investigation
Le spectre de la villa – Romance d`aubergine – Une pièce pour une enquête
Bessou no Akuryou / Nasu Roman / One Coin Chousa
episode.summary: Rinne tries to purify a poltergeist, and Sakura helps a spirit who`s scared of eggplants. Later, the group takes a trip to a festival to bust a Damashigami scheme. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 花畑の謎 / 右腕貸します / 黒い通知表
Mystery of the Flower Field / I Will Lend You My Right Arm / Black Report Card
Le mystère du champ de fleurs – Je te prête ma main droite – Le noir bulletin scolaire
Hanabatake no Nazo / Migiude Kashimasu / Kuroi Tsuuchihyou
episode.summary: A search for Kain goes awry as Ageha and Matsugo continue to fight for Rinne`s affection. Later, Sakura notices that Rinne, who never studies, is passing every test. How? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 散財の呪い / 呪われたのぞき玉
Curse of Splurge / The Cursed Peep Ball
L`envoûtement panier percé – La boule de vision maudite
Sanzai no Noroi / Norowareta Nozoki Tama
episode.summary: Stingy Annette finds herself suddenly unable to save money. Is it truly a snake spirit`s curse? Later, Masato attempts to sabotage Rinne`s happiness... again. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: こっくりさん / 呪金箱 / 嫌われた三世
Kokkuri-san / Cursed Piggy Bank / The Hated Sansei
Kokkuri-san – La tirelire maudite – Sanse le mal-aimé
Kokkuri-san / Kashiri Kanebako / Kirawareta Sansei
episode.summary: Ichigo asks Rinne to banish "Kokkuri-san". Sabato tries to offload a cursed piggy bank. Later, Sansei makes another attempt to fight his fear of spirits. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウソと真実
Lies and Truth
Mensonge et vérité
Uso to Shinjitsu
episode.summary: Sabato reveals an interesting detail concerning the disappearance of Rinne`s mother, leading the others to a startling revelation about little Ichigo`s true identity. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死神 乙女
Otome the Shinigami
Otome la Shinigami
Shinigami Otome
episode.summary: While visiting a pawn shop Rinne discovers something related to his mother, and learns more about her. Later, Sakura and Rinne check on a little girl who can see spirits. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夢魔捕縛実習
The Practical Training for Capturing a Dream Demon
La capture du démon onirique
Muma Hobaku Jisshuu
episode.summary: Rinne`s dreams are being invaded by a Dream Demon. To stop the madness, Rinne and Matsugo have to capture a it in a world where one person`s dream is another`s nightmare! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 首男 / 月に願いを / 第一回サンマ祭り
Head Man / When You Wish Upon the Moon / The First Saury Festival
L`homme-tête – Un souhait à la lune – Le premier festival du balaou
Kubi Otoko / Tsuki ni Negai o / Daiikkai Sanma Matsuri
episode.summary: Refuto hires Rinne to protect an offering of delicious dumplings. Later, Rinne looks forward to a Saury Festival... with one hidden condition. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 祝福の羽 / カバ吉くん / カセットテープの悲鳴
Wings of Celebration / Kabakichi-kun / Scream of a Cassette Tape
Les ailes du bonheur / Hippo-kichi / La plainte de la cassette
Shukufuku no Hane / Kabakichi-kun / Cassette Tape no Himei
episode.summary: Something terrible has happened to Matsugo: he`s turned into an angel! Worse, he`s HELPING people! Later, Sakura and Ichigo bump into Shoma as he tries to help a hippo spirit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 中身がない / 腰砕け坂の怪 / 松茸の波紋
Nothing Inside / Mystery of Koshikudake Hill / Effect of the Matsutake Mushroom
Rien à l`intérieur / Le mystère de la côte insurmontable / Les rides du matsutake
Nakami ga Nai / Koshikudake Saka no Kai / Matsutake no Hamon
episode.summary: Incidents around steamed buns make life difficult for Rinne and Rokumon. Later, Rinne experiences a problem originating from a mysterious package of mushrooms. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 指輪と印鑑 / 縁側のエサ / 黒猫こども会
A Ring and Stamp / Food at the Porch / Black Cat Children`s Association
La bague et le sceau / De la nourriture sous la véranda / La fête des chatons noirs
Yubiwa to Inkan / Engawa no Esa / Kuroneko Kodomo Kai
episode.summary: Ageha has one last chance to stop her sister from making the biggest mistake of her life: marrying Sabato! Later, Rinne discovers that Rokumon may have a secret food supply. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 四角くて黒いやつ / 路地の近道
Black Square Thing / Shortcut Through the Alley
Le rectangle noir / Le raccourci par la ruelle
Shikakukute Kuroi Yatsu / Roji no Chikamichi
episode.summary: Rinne is suspected of stealing money at his own school! On the hunt to find the actual perpetrator, he discovers how little faith his friends have in him and his poverty. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥界の約束
A Promise in the Underworld
Promesse au royaume des Enfers
Meikai no Yakusoku
episode.summary: Matsugo invites Rinne to his school festival, so (of course) Sakura, Jumonji, and Renge come along. The festival`s ghost-house proves more dangerous than they thought. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 猛犬捕獲補習 / 金霊 / 悪霊遺産
Supplemental Class for Fierce Dog Catching / Money Spirit / Evil Spirit`s Legacy
Capture de chien méchant / L`esprit doré / L`héritage
Mouken Hokaku Hoshuu / Kanadama / Akuryou Isan
episode.summary: Sakura finds herself dealing with a fierce dog spirit... but is he really a dog? Later, Rinne wonders if his never ending money problems can be solved by a money spirit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 金運ワックス / マネ子とコト美 / 振り込みはまだか!
Good Luck Wax / Maneko and Kotomi / Where`s My Money?!
La Cire de la fortune — Maneko et Mantomi — Où est mon remboursement ?
Kin`un Wax / Maneko to Kotomi / Furikomi wa Mada ka!
episode.summary: The new wax finish on Rinne`s scythe is attracting coins! Later, Sakura helps her friends Miho and Rika when a walking mannequin attacks them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 2
Ending 2
